52 #define RINGBUFFER_TYPEDEF(name,type,size) \
53  typedef struct { \
54  size_t head; \
55  size_t tail; \
56  size_t count; \
57  type items [size]; \
58  } name##_ringbuffer_t

87  (sizeof(RINGBUFFER_ITEMS(ringbuffer)))

94  (RINGBUFFER_SIZEOF(ringbuffer)/sizeof(RINGBUFFER_ITEMS(ringbuffer)[0]))

115 #define RINGBUFFER_TAIL(ringbuffer) \
116  ((ringbuffer).tail)

121 #define RINGBUFFER_INIT(ringbuffer) \
122  do{ \
123  RINGBUFFER_COUNT(ringbuffer)=0; \
124  RINGBUFFER_HEAD(ringbuffer)=0; \
125  RINGBUFFER_TAIL(ringbuffer)=0; \
126  }while(0)
127 
131 #define RINGBUFFER_TAIL_VAL(ringbuffer) \
132  (RINGBUFFER_ITEMS(ringbuffer)[RINGBUFFER_TAIL(ringbuffer)])
133 
137 #define RINGBUFFER_TAIL_PTR(ringbuffer) \
138  (&RINGBUFFER_TAIL_VAL(ringbuffer))
139 
143 #define RINGBUFFER_HEAD_VAL(ringbuffer) \
144  (RINGBUFFER_ITEMS(ringbuffer)[RINGBUFFER_HEAD(ringbuffer)])
145 
149 #define RINGBUFFER_HEAD_PTR(ringbuffer) \
150  (&RINGBUFFER_HEAD_VAL(ringbuffer))
151 
158 #define RINGBUFFER_PUSH(ringbuffer) \
159  do { \
160  if(++RINGBUFFER_TAIL(ringbuffer) == RINGBUFFER_SIZE(ringbuffer)) \
161  { \
162  RINGBUFFER_TAIL(ringbuffer) = 0; \
163  } \
164  \
165  RINGBUFFER_COUNT(ringbuffer)++; \
166  }while (0)
167 
168 
175 #define RINGBUFFER_POP(ringbuffer) \
176  do { \
177  if(++RINGBUFFER_HEAD(ringbuffer) == RINGBUFFER_SIZE(ringbuffer)) \
178  { \
179  RINGBUFFER_HEAD(ringbuffer) = 0; \
180  } \
181  \
182  RINGBUFFER_COUNT(ringbuffer)--; \
183  }while (0)
184 
189 #define RINGBUFFER_FULL(ringbuffer) \
190  (RINGBUFFER_COUNT(ringbuffer)>=RINGBUFFER_SIZE(ringbuffer))
191 
192 
197 #define RINGBUFFER_EMPTY(ringbuffer) \
198  (!RINGBUFFER_COUNT(ringbuffer))
199 
200 
206 #define RINGBUFFER_READ(ringbufferptr,var) \
207  do { \
208  var = RINGBUFFER_HEAD_VAL(ringbufferptr); \
209  RINGBUFFER_POP(ringbufferptr); \
210  }while(0)
211 
218 #define RINGBUFFER_WRITE(ringbufferptr,value) \
219  do { \
220  RINGBUFFER_TAIL_VAL(ringbufferptr) = value; \
221  RINGBUFFER_PUSH(ringbufferptr); \
222  }while(0)
223

225 #endif /* RINGBUFFER_H_ */
